page.title: 08Mobile Homes-welcome or not?
page.content:
Mobile Homes seem to be endemic in this part of Kent. On the western side of{West Kingsdown}are several sites for caravans of all sorts.
Fronting onto the A20 are both {permanent emplacements,}for year-round occupancy and{storage facilities}for parking caravans during the winter laying-up. Down the road into Knatts Valley is a{holiday site}for tourers, with facilities which include a swimming pool.
These sites cause no problems locally, but at Swan Farm in Ash,{plots}have been{sold}to mobile home owners {without council approval}for such use. Local residents are against such usage and the{Sevenoaks District Council have got a{compulsory purchase order and are now{evicting}the caravans.
